summary: The agent report is very good, accurately identifying root causes and metrics, but it misses some causal links and elements related to CM and voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the VCORE floor and ceiling issues but did not explicitly mention CM or PowerHal.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly captured, but the link to CM and SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms is missing.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent report accurately captured most of the relevant metrics.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and follows the data, but lacks mention of CM as a potential cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical and relevant, focusing on DDR voting mechanisms.
